TEXT.BODY: Shr 65 cts vs 10 cts Net 55,960,000 vs 8,785,000 Revs 588.2 mln vs 596.1 mln Avg shrs 85,710,000 vs 87,987,000 Nine mths Shr 1.24 dlrs vs 44 cts Net 106,738,000 vs 39,055,000 Revs 1.98 billion vs 2.24 billion Avg shrs 86,320,000 vs 88,007,000 NOTE: 1986 data restated for adoption of new accounting standard relating to pensions 1987 nine month earnings include 331 mln dlr after-tax writeoff in the 4th Qtr of 1985 of a portion of the assets of the company's Midland nuclear project Reuter
